titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Senate concerning His Majesty King Bhumibol Adulyadej of Thailand.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Asian and Pacific Affairs.

bill.summary: 6/28/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that King Bhumibol Adulyadej of Thailand be congratulated for becoming the longest reigning monarch in that country's history.
